job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for a skilled backend software engineer to join the Product Catalogs team. Our team builds products and infrastructure that enable retail advertisers to succeed on Reddit. On our team, you'd work projects like:
     * Catalog System Scaling - In order to support larger and more sophisticated advertisers, we must scale our system to support millions of products per customer. You'd have the opportunity to load test, identify bottlenecks, and deploy optimizations to make these customers successful.
     * Catalog Management - With millions of products, advertisers need tools to manage those products, identify errors, and build campaigns based on subsets of products.
     * Product Enhancement - Leveraging AI and LLMs to make our products more appealing to users by showcasing products popular with Redditors, enhancing product image backgrounds with GenAI, and much more!

   Responsibilities:
    1. Develop, maintain, and scale our product catalogs backend
    2. Contribute to the development of features to make our product easier to use
    3. Produce robust and sustainable code and demonstrate proficiency in debugging systems beyond your immediate responsibilities.
    4. Uphold high-quality standards within the team.

   Technologies used on the team include:
     * Languages: Python, Scala, Go
     * Frameworks: gRPC, Thrift, Baseplate, Kafka
     * Datastores: Postgres, BigQuery, Redis
     * Tools: Kubernetes, Airflow
job_details.full_text:
Software Engineer, Product Catalogs

We are looking for a skilled backend software engineer to join the Product Catalogs team. Our team builds products and infrastructure that enable retail advertisers to succeed on Reddit. On our team, you'd work projects like:
     * Catalog System Scaling - In order to support larger and more sophisticated advertisers, we must scale our system to support millions of products per customer. You'd have the opportunity to load test, identify bottlenecks, and deploy optimizations to make these customers successful.
     * Catalog Management - With millions of products, advertisers need tools to manage those products, identify errors, and build campaigns based on subsets of products.
     * Product Enhancement - Leveraging AI and LLMs to make our products more appealing to users by showcasing products popular with Redditors, enhancing product image backgrounds with GenAI, and much more!

   Responsibilities:
    1. Develop, maintain, and scale our product catalogs backend
    2. Contribute to the development of features to make our product easier to use
    3. Produce robust and sustainable code and demonstrate proficiency in debugging systems beyond your immediate responsibilities.
    4. Uphold high-quality standards within the team.

   Technologies used on the team include:
     * Languages: Python, Scala, Go
     * Frameworks: gRPC, Thrift, Baseplate, Kafka
     * Datastores: Postgres, BigQuery, Redis
     * Tools: Kubernetes, Airflow

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional backend software engineering for product catalogs, with only a minor mention of AI/LLMs for product enhancement. The core responsibilities and technologies listed are not indicative of a specialized AI or ML engineering role.

job_tasks.phrase: Catalog System Scaling - In order to support larger and more sophisticated advertisers, we must scale our system to support millions of products per customer. You'd have the opportunity to load test, identify bottlenecks, and deploy optimizations to make these customers successful.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes scaling a backend system, identifying bottlenecks, and deploying optimizations, which are core software development and system engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Catalog Management - With millions of products, advertisers need tools to manage those products, identify errors, and build campaigns based on subsets of products.
job_tasks.justification: This describes building tools and features for managing product data, which falls under software development for user-facing or internal applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Product Enhancement - Leveraging AI and LLMs to make our products more appealing to users by showcasing products popular with Redditors, enhancing product image backgrounds with GenAI, and much more!
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions leveraging 'AI and LLMs' and 'GenAI' for product enhancement, indicating the use or development of generative models.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop, maintain, and scale our product catalogs backend
job_tasks.justification: This is a direct statement of core software development responsibilities, focusing on backend systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to the development of features to make our product easier to use
job_tasks.justification: This describes building new features, a fundamental software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Produce robust and sustainable code and demonstrate proficiency in debugging systems beyond your immediate responsibilities.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights core software engineering practices like writing quality code and debugging.

job_tasks.phrase: Uphold high-quality standards within the team.
job_tasks.justification: Upholding quality standards implies a pragmatic and results-oriented approach to development.

soft_skills.phrase: Uphold high-quality standards within the team.
